short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple plugin to check the status of your sejour application on the French government website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It happens that some foreigners in France do not receive SMS or emails from the migration authorities with the status of readiness of their documents. As a result, they are forced to spend months waiting for their documents.

This plugin allows you to check the status of your document, if you do not receive a text message or email notification from the French prefecture. And cut down on weeks or months of useless waiting time.

Find out your status immediately and make an appointment to receive your documents at the prefecture.
